physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a man. He is sitting down. Resolution of phootgraph is not high enough to identify more details
sgcool_label_text:
This photograph shows a seated man in Chinese robes and a hat.

Studios were already established across the Strait Settlements and the Dutch East Indies by the 1840s and became increasingly prevalent in the 1850s. During the 1920s, Chinese-owned studios dominated the studio photography trade in Southeast Asia.
title_text: Photograph of a seated Chinese man
subject_terms_1: black-and-white photographs portraits men (male humans) folk costume
subject_terms_2: Black-and-white photography Portrait photography Men Ethnic costume
